Gandys is a revolutionary brand created by two young brothers, who have spent many years travelling the world. In 2004, they were travelling in Sri Lanka when the Boxing Day tsunami struck. Tragically they lost their parents in the disaster. The brothers wanted to help other children who have suffered the same loss by making these flip flops to raise money. So for every pair of our flip flops bought by you, Gandy`s will be donating 10% of the profits to help other children less fortunate in developing countries. By the end of 2014, the brothers want to open a children's home in the memory of their parents to mark the 10th anniversary of the tsunami. The brothers long-term goal is to have Gandys social projects run by Gandys all over the world.    • Originals   • Branded  • Rubber  • Solid Flip Flops
